defs: ಚಿತ್ತೋದ್ವೇಗ.
an excited state or condition of the mind; excitement.
distress or uneasiness of mind caused by fear of danger or misfortune; anxiety.
that is causing excitement; exciting.
that is causing anxiety.
the Supreme, the Absolute Consciousness.
the personification of the Absolute Consciousness; the Supreme.
the act of collecting together or piling up.
a pile, esp. of wood, on which a dead body (of a human being) is burned in a funeral rite.
easy to see or understand; clear; obvious; plain, apparent; evident.
that is attractive; splendid; brilliant.
having or marked with, varied colours or shades; variegated.
that causes wonder; wonderful; marvellous.
a picture - a) an image or likeness of an object, person or scene produced on a flat surface, by painting, drawing; b) a printed reproduction of this; c) an image or picture made by photography.
something strange and surprising; a cause of surprise, astonishment or admiration; a wonder.
that which is or the quality of being, auspicious.
any of a class of chemical elements, as iron, gold or aluminum, gen. characterised by ductility, malleability, luster, and conductivity of heat and electricity; a metal.
a sectarian or decorative mark made on the forehead.
the herbaceous plant Plumbago zeylanica of Plumbaginaceae family.
air or wind.
a continuous series of motion pictures, in which events, fictions etc. have been filmed and usu. projected on a screen, so as to convey candid reality; a cinema.
(rhet.) a kind of verse composition in which letters, words are used in a tricky manner to give special sense.
(rhet.) a kind of figure of speech dependent on the sound of words.
a variety in the metre of tripadi (a verse having three lines).
ಚಿತ್ರದ ಬೊಂಬೆ citrada bombe a beautiful, innocent child, girl or woman; 2. the state of being stupefied, bewildered and hence motionless.
to draw a picture.
one who draws or paints pictures.
the large feline mammal, Panthera pardus, with a black-spotted yellowish-fawn; a panther; a leopard.
the large flesh-eating feline, Panthera tigris, having a yellow-brown coat with black stripes; a tiger.
a sectarian or decorative mark on the forehead.
the herbaceous plant Plumbago zeylanica of Plumbaginaceae family.
the plant, Ricinus communis, of the Euphorbiaceae family, cultivated for its oil yielding seeds; castor plant.
one of the four types of men according to erotic science.
any bird of the family Columbidae, having a compact body and short legs; a dove.
a wonderful or very interesting story, anecdote.
a sequence of drawings relating an incident, adventure or mystery story, etc., specially meant for children; a story, for children, supported by ample number of pictures printed.
the script from which a film is produced; a story adapted for making a film.
one who draws or paints pictures.
the act, process of drawing or painting pictures.
the drawing or paintings so done.
a carved figure or design; a carving.
the art of drawing, painting pictures.
(rhet.) a kind of verse composition in which letters, words are used in a tricky manner to give special sense.

imagination of an artist ; a) the power of forming mental images of what is not actually present; b) the power of creating mental images of what has never been actually experienced or of creating new images or ideas by combining previous experiences; creative power.
a beautiful, well-proportioned or handsome body.
the large flesh-eating feline, Panthera tigris, having a yellow-brown coat with black stripes; a tiger.
the processed skin of a tiger; the tiger's leather.
one who draws or paints pictures.
(rhet.) a poetical work in which more importance is given to the words or their literary senses, than to the suggested senses or figurative meanings (which quality, is considered inferior).
a portable shelter of skins, canvas, plastic or the like, supported by one or more poles or a frame and often secured by ropes fastened to pegs in the ground; a tent.
an act, movement etc. that is extraordinary, hence causing amazement.
= ಚಿತ್ರಕಾರ.
a song, set to an appealing tune, and picturised for, and included in, the sequence of a film; a film-song.
an attendant of the Death God Yama, who is supposed to keep record of the virtues and vices of every individual, throughout his or her lifetime.
(fig.) a slanderer or sly-informant.
a room or building for exhibiting or dealing in artworks; an art-gallery.
the act of producing art or craft works.
something produced in one of the fine arts, as a painting, sculpture, carving, etc.
a worker in a skilled trade; an artisan or artist.
a man who has led an exemplary, wonderful life.
= ಚಿತ್ರಚರಿತ.
a man who has expert knowledge of and keen discrimination or taste in the art of painting; a connoisseur.
a woman who has expert knowledge of and keen discrimination or taste in the art of painting; a connoisseur.
the plant Embelia ribes of Myrsinaceae family, used as an insect killer.
drawn, portrayed in a picture.
a specially prepared piece of canvas on which an oil painting is made.
such a painting.
a cloth of various colours or shades.

a sequence of photographs or drawings projected on a screen in such rapid succession that they create the the optical illusion (because of the persistence of vision) of moving persons and objects; a film; a cinema.
a strip of pictures; a row of photographs.
the (long) handle that is carved or painted with pictures, of a fan (used in royal courts or temples).
(collectively) plant leaves of different colours or shades.
a cloth of various colours or shades.
(pros.) a metre with ten syllables in each line.
(pros.) another metre with eight syllables in each line.
the plant Hedysarum lagopodioides.
a slender, straight, pointed missile or weapon to be shot from a bow and equipped with feathers at the end of the shaft near the nock, for controlling flight; an arrow.
a beautiful idol.
(fig.) a beautiful, innocent child, girl or woman.
the state of being stupefied, bewildered and hence motionless.
= ಚಿತ್ರಪುತ್ತಳಿ.
a number of or series of events, incidents that are amazing, wonderful.
the sphere of activities connected with acting in or making, distributing and exhibiting of films; the world of cinema.
a picture in its entirety.
a particular mode, manner of using colours in painting.
the frame holding the canvas for painting on.
a frame holding a photograph, painting, etc.
the plant Euphorbia thymifolia of Euphorbiaceae plant.
the sun, the bright-shining one.
fire or the Fire-God.
name of the sixteenth year in the Hindu cycle of sixty years.
a wall decorated with pictures.
a collection of pictures, photographs etc.
a film made from bits of another film or various other films; an anthology of films.
a building or outdoor structure designed for presentation of films; a cinema hall; a theatre.
a series of pictures, bits of films, etc. arranged in a particular order.
the under-shrub Plumbago zeylanica of Plumbaginaceae family; Ceylon lead wort.
= ಚಿತ್ರಮೂಲ.
the spotted Indian deer.
the Sun-God, whose vehicle is made of bright rays of light.
the Fire-God.
a person who can change his or her form at will (as a demon).
an unusual form that causes amazement.
(pros.) a metre with twenty-five syllables in each line.
(pros.) a variety in the metres of tripadi (each stanza having three lines each).
a picture or picture-like symbol representing an idea, as in primitive writing; pictograph.
writing by the use of pictographs; picture writing; pictography.
the creeper Aganosma cymosa (= Echites dichotoma) of Apocynceae family.
a killing by inflicting severe pain.
(fig.) the inflicting of severe pain; torture.
(fig.) very great mental pain inflicted on or being undergone; agony; anguish.
= ಚಿತ್ರಪ್ರವರ್ತನ.
a specially prepared piece of canvas on which an oil painting is made; canvas.
a cloth of various colours or shades.
having or marked with different patches or spots colours, shades.
deviating from the norm, as in conduct; out of the ordinary; odd.
a way, manner, mode etc. that is exquisite, astonishing, amazing or astounding.

any of various broad-bodied, four-winged, hairy hymenopteran insects of Apoidea family, that gather pollen and nectar, have biting as well as sucking mouthparts, and often live in organized colonies; esp., the honeybee.
= ಚಿತ್ರವಿಹಂಗ.
the fret-less Vīṇe, a long, stringed musical instrument, played by plucking the strings and played by pressing the strings with a pad.
a manner, way etc. that is astonishing, marvelling.
a particular manner or way of animal-hunting, as a sport.
a variegated sīre (sari, the traditional long unsewn cloth used by women).
a room or building where pictures, photographs, paints etc. are exhibited.
having a bright crest or colourful feathered tuft.
(pl.) the seven mythological sages of Hindu tradition.
(particularly) Angīrasa, one of them.
a most conspicuous north constellation between Lynx and Draco which contains more than 50 visible stars, seven of which form the Big Dipper; Ursa Major.
a person who draws or paints pictures.
a casket, box or chest decorated with pictures or carvings.
(fig.) a book or holder that contains a number of or a series of pictures; an album.
a kind of silk cloth.
a literary work of varied styles.
extreme pain, intense suffering, unbearable distress inflicted; torture.
(myth.) name of one of the hells.
having bands or stripes; striped.
the black-striped, large, carnivorous, tawny-coloured feline, Panthera tigris; the tiger.
a cloth with long, narrow stripes.
an overcoat made of striped or variegated cloth.
a woman whose body is beautiful.
(mus.) a fault in pronouncing the musical notes or the lyrics.
a piece of cloth having different colours in spots, stripes; a part-coloured cloth.
the clear sky in the night with stars.
a set of words with same number of letters in each, written one below the other, the vertical reading of the letters of which gives the same words as written across; an acrostic.
a non-gravy food made by cooking the rice with various condiments, spices, and subsequently seasoned.
a few grains of boiled rice symbolically offered, as part of one's daily sacrifice, to a few deities before taking one's mid-day meal.
the illusion, false idea created by a picture, painting, etc.
an archaic kind of poetical composition that was specific to Kannaḍa literature.
(archit.) a half relief or an image half of whose body is shown.
committed to a picture; picturised; painted.
without moving; motionless; still; stationary.
(rhet.) a figure of speech in which an interrogative asking has in itself the answer for it in a suggestive or implied manner.
= ಚಿತ್ರಾಹುತಿ.
the state of possessing or having various colours.
that which causes to feel wonder or appreciation by being beautiful, colourful, unexpectedly pleasing, etc.
= ಚಿತ್ರಾಂಬರ.
= ಚಿತ್ರಾಂಬರ.
a heavy, smooth-surfaced fabric, commonly of wool or nylon, for sitting on; a carpet.
a few grains of boiled rice symbolically offered, as part of one's daily sacrifice, to a few deities before taking one's mid-day meal.
a kind of plant .
one who draws or paints pictures.
(fem.) one who draws or paints pictures.
an archaic stringed, musical instrument.
an intelligent woman.
a woman of one of the four types of women according to erotic science.
drawn or painted (as a picture); presented in a drawing, painting etc; portrayed; pictured; sketched out.
marked with different colours in spots, stripes, etc.
(fig.) depicted in words; described.
to write, draw or paint a picture; to make a picture.
to be written, painted so.
to film - a) to take a photograph of; b) to make a (motion) film of a novel, play, event, etc.; to shoot.
to picture in words; to describe vividly or colourfully; to depict.
the brightest star in the constellation Virgo, with a magnitude of 1.03; the Spica.
the onset of rain during the appearance of this star.
the plant Anthericum tuberosum of Liliaceae family.
the plant Cucumis madraspatanus of Cucurbitaceae family.
an expression, using words in a nonliteral sense or unusual manner to add vividness, beauty, sarcasm, etc. to what is said or written.
= ಚಿತ್ರಾಲಂಕಾರ.
2.(fig.) a manner of wording a sentence in such a way that is meant to be or can be interpreted as, the answer, response or explanation for several questions, doubts or inquires.
spiritual joy ( achieved when pure self-consciousness is realised); the absolute bliss.
the Supreme, as a formless and being in the pure Conscious state.
the spiritual space or interval where the Supreme is realised by yōgis.
ಚಿದಂಬರ ರಹಸ್ಯ cidambara rahasya (fig.) something beyond the normal human knowledge or understanding; anything unexplained or seemingly inexplicable matter; a mystery.
(phil.) the pure consciousness as the essential nature of the individual soul.
the pulse of Dolichos lablab soaked in water and skinned by squeezing.
to remove the skin of a soaked pulse by squeezing with a finger and the thumb.
that which is (soaked and) skinned by squeezing with a finger and the thumb.
= ಚಿದ್ರ.
(phil.) the Supreme Soul as the pure Consciousness.
the philosophic combination of the pure Consciousness and the supreme Bliss, as the nature of the Absolute.
the Absolute, characterised by the pure Consciousness and supreme Bliss.
th individual soul as the reflection or the like of the supreme Consciousness.
personification of the absolute Consciousness.
personification of the absolute Consciousness.
an opening caused by or as if by splitting; a hole, slit; fissure or rent.
an open break, disagreement, breach in the friendly relationship between two persons or amongst the members of a party, society, etc.
an act of causing or promoting dissent (esp. among the members in the enemy camp).
a broken-away piece of a whole.
a man showing friendly feelings.
the pure Consciousness.
the Supreme.
to break (a whole) and take out a small piece; to cut into small pieces; to mince.
a small piece or part broken away from a whole; broken piece; a fragment.

= ಚಿನಕಡಿ1.
to be cut into small pieces; to be minced.

a kind of cracker that makes short but sharp sound.

= ಚಿನ್ನಗಾಳೆ.
a cloth that is conspicuous with spots woven with bright, shining threads on it.
a sīre that is conspicuous with spots woven with bright, shining threads on it.
(dial.) a nut of coconut palm, in the very early stage.

anything that belongs to, coming from originated in, China or made of china-clay.
a kind of silk cloth.
the large-sized, deciduous tree Platanus lrientalis of Platnaceae family, the wood of which is used for making boxes, handicraft items, etc.
an unchaste, promiscuous woman.

of the nature of pure consciousness or spiritual intelligence.
the Supreme, who is characterised by pure Consciousness.

a precious yellow metallic element, highly malleable and ductile, and not subject to oxidation or corrosion (Symbol: Au); gold.
a monetary coin made of gold; a gold coin.
a term of endearment used to call children, one's sweetheart, etc.; (as) 'love', 'my love' or 'darling'.
(fig.) a person of unblemished merit.

ಚಿನ್ನದ ಎಳೆ cinnada eḷe a thin wire of wire, used in making ornaments or in textiles; ಚಿನ್ನದ ಗಣಿ cinnada gaṇi (fig.) a place, position, authority which provides ample opportunity to get information, income, etc.; 2. (fig.) a generous, magnanimous person; ಚಿನ್ನದ ಹಬ್ಬ cinnada habba golden jubilee - the fiftieth anniversary; b) a celebration of this; ಚಿನ್ನದ ತೊಟ್ಟಿಲಲ್ಲಿ ಹುಟ್ಟಿರು cinnada toṭṭilalli huṭṭiru (fig) to be affluent since one's birth; ಚಿನ್ನದ ಸೂಜಿ ಎಂದು ಕಣ್ಣು ಚುಚ್ಚಿಕೊ cinnada sūji endu kaṇṇu cucciko (prov.) pain inflicted by a person however dear to oneself, is still a pain; fetters even of gold are heavy; ಚಿನ್ನ ಹಿಡಿದರೂ ಮಣ್ಣಾಗು cinna hiḍidarū maṇṇāgu to be very unlucky.
of limited size; of comparatively restricted dimensions; not big; little; small.
that which is small in size; a little thing.

a kind of double-tube air horn used to make a long sound by blowing; a double-bugle.

a symbol - a) something that stands for, represents or suggests another thing; esp., an object used to represent something abstract; an emblem; b) a written or printed mark, letter, abbreviation, etc. standing for an object, quality, process, quantity, etc., as in music, mathematics or chemistry.
to show, exhibit a symbol.
to appear (before someone).

a chimney - a) a vertical channel conducting smoke or combustion gases etc. up and away from a fire, furnace, engine, etc.; b) the part of this which projects above a roof. 2.a hollow glassware open on both sides used to protect the flame of a burning oil-lamp.
a bottle-type glassware used as an oil-lamp (usu. without a protective glassware for its flame).

to make a splitting sound (as by wet twigs while being burnt).

to throw something up in the air.
to jump in the air or leap forward pushing the ground simultaneously with both the feet.
to give out or forth from within.
to sprinkle or drop in drops.
to brandish or wave (a weapon, as a sword).
to move (as a fan).
the act or an instance of jumping up or leaping forward.

a stream of liquid or gas emitted or forced out, as from a spout.
an instinct - a) a primal psychic force or drive, as fear, love or anger, etc.; b) an inborn tendency of a living being.
to move upward or forward suddenly from the ground, etc. by contracting the muscles; to jump or leap.

a device consisting of a narrow tube of glass, rubber or metal, with a narrowed outlet and fitted at another end with a rubber bulb or piston by means of which a liquid can be drawn in and then ejected in a stream.
= ಚಿಮ್ಮಟ.
a long unsewn cloth wound round the head, as a headgear.

a dhōti (an unsewn long cloth used by men to cover their body below the navel) the hem or end of which is tucked into the waist-band, passing between the legs, as by a soldier while going for a battle.
the tying of a persons both hand on his back.
lasting, living for all the times to come; never coming to an end; lasting forever.
that which never comes to an end or is never dying.
a person who is grateful, indebted to another (for the help, favour received); a person of gratitude.
for eternity; for all times; always; endlessly; forever.
a person who will never die.
a long-lived person.
a term used by an elderly person to address a younger one.
one's son.
the common black bird Corvus splendens; the crow.
a woman, either married or not, who stays in her father's house for long, even after her maturity.
a young woman.
having lasted very long; very old; ancient.
lasting forever; deathless; endless.
the quality or fact of lasting for long or forever.
an aged, old man.
a scholar, teacher of ancient times.
(myth.) name of one of the hells.
a period that is continuing without any further limit; an everlasting period.
lasting forever; eternal.
